id.description: The unique identifier for the collection.

handle.description: A unique URL-friendly string that represents the collection.

title.description: The title or name of the collection.

updated_at.description: The datetime when the collection was last updated.

body_html.description: The HTML content describing the collection.

published_at.description: The datetime when the collection was published.

sort_order.description: The order in which the collection should be sorted.

template_suffix.description: The name of the template that is used to render the collection.

products_count.description: The number of products within the collection.

collection_type.description: The type or category of the collection.

published_scope.description: The visibility of the collection to customers.

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier for the collection in the Admin GraphQL API.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop where the collection belongs.
